title: About
paragraph1: I'm a web developer with a focus on the front-end. I build solutions for businesses and am passionate about open-source software. I'm a {bitcoinCashLink} advocate, and I design and ship projects that align with my ethics.
paragraph2: I mainly work React and TypeScript, but I'm not married to any stack: I always try to find the most suitable tools for each specific project. Below are some of the technologies I work with often.
callToAction: You can check out my {cvLink} or {contactLink}.
